bibl.title: The Fight of Telephus: Poetic Visions behind the Pergamon Frieze.
bibl.note: See pp. 54-57: discusses the myth of Telephus in, among others, Hesiod's Catalogue of Women (fr. 117 Most = P. Oxy. XI, 1359 [= M.-P.3 525; LDAB 1223], fr. 1, 12-25) and in Archilochus (P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 [= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327], fr. 1, 5-15).

bibl.title: The Look of Lyric: Greek Song and the Visual

bibl.seg: Laura Lulli, The Fight of Telephus: Poetic Visions behind the Pergamon Frieze.

Vanessa Cazzato & Andr√© Lardinois (edd.), with an Introduction by Anastasia-Erasmia Peponi, The Look of Lyric: Greek Song and the Visual = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 1 = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 391 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 50-68, 5 figg.

See pp. 54-57: discusses the myth of Telephus in, among others, Hesiod's Catalogue of Women (fr. 117 Most = P. Oxy. XI, 1359 [= M.-P.3 525; LDAB 1223], fr. 1, 12-25) and in Archilochus (P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 [= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327], fr. 1, 5-15).
